R packages & contributions to R packages

R package system requirements
package
The goal of sysreqs is to make it easy to identify R package system dependencies. There are two components to this package: an “API” and a wrapper package.

Urban Informatics Toolkit

urban-informatics

The Urban Informatics Toolkit (uitk) is an open text book I wrote with the intention of teaching first year graduate students in Urban Informatics the R programming language.
